programme.desc: Badge Quest is a series in which Wilson, Brewster and Koko attempt to earn a badge. Almost every character from the first season is featured in these episodes.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Badge Quest is a series in which Wilson, Brewster and Koko attempt to earn a badge. Almost every character from the first season is featured in these episodes.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are having fun discovering various animals’ houses. When they realize butterflies don’t have a house, they decide to build a beautiful "Butterfly Hotel!" But when the edifice is finally ready… another animal - one that is not at all to T’choupi’s liking - moves in instead!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When Nina asks T’choupi to accompany her to the forest for a fitness session, our little hero gets very excited… until they reach the location and there’s no fitness trail in sight! Nina laughs: that’s the funnest part about it - they’ll use the tree trunks, boulders and branches to make their own parcourse! T’choupi drags his heels as he follows Nina through the "trail." Then, when he trips and falls, he wants to call it quits… But what if he were to invent his very own fitness trail in the forest? Wouldn’t that be fun…?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While looking for a lost toy under a bunch of crates, Nina and T’choupi discover some very strange hairs belonging to some unidentified animal … In a mystery, the two friends head off to inspect all the animals of the hamlet in an attempt to track down the owner of the strange fur... But a big surprise awaits them…!

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Charley and his friends were surprised when they came back from a walk in the forest to find a baby hedgehog curled up in Lilys bag. They nicknamed him PicPic and hid him in the vegetable garden, because if Medhi found out about his existence, hed want to take him back to the forest straight away! So, unbeknownst to their host, the friends take it in turns to look after him. But PicPic... disappears!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Tonight there is a children show for the parents. Julia planned a scooter act with Sam. But Sam doesnt dare to tell her he is very bad on those wheels. How long can he avoid to tell her the truth?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: To help his little brother Ben feel less frustrated by his young age, Sam decided to help him. Together with Julia, they try to come up with a good scheme to make him feel like a hero.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia have decided to play doctors to help their friends stuffed animals and heal dolls hurts. Dr. Julia and Sam, her nurse, pay visits to some of them in the Mouse Mansion.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: James likes to show off and be the centre of attention, but when he doesn’t get his own way, he sulks and pouts. One day James is showing off so much that the passengers start complaining so the Fat Controller takes his coaches away. James starts to pout and he is still pouting the next morning. He is so sulky and rude that the Fat Controller leaves him in his shed. Eventually James apologises and the Fat Controller gives him some work to do, but when James discovers that he’s pulling waste trucks he starts sulking again and it is only when his friends help him laugh at himself that James finally manages to find a way to dowhat he has to do, and even enjoy it!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: A storm is approaching and Skiff and Joe, the Lighthouse Keeper, patrol Arlesburgh, helping everyone to prepare for it. Duck and Oliver don’t think a ‘tiny little railboat’ should be out in a storm and it seems they are right when Skiff’s anchor rope snaps and his sail unfurls. Skiff is terrified as he gets blown down the track and right into a tree that lightning has brought down across the branchline. When Skiff realises that both Oliver and Duck are heading towards the tree he manages to raise his sail to warn them and avert a serious accident.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou is having a fun day playing with his Marbles,when Grandpa arrives with his old Trainset. Grandpa likes toplay slow and steady - but Caillou and Daddy have other ideas!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou and Rosie go to a farm to select a new pet - aBunny! But when they take the rabbit home, Caillou is a bit tooloud and excitable, meaning the rabbit becomes more comfortablewith Rosie.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: A mysterious giant circle appears in the middle of a corn field. Although Pig Will and Pig Won’t are convinced it’s the landing site of an alien flying saucer, Huckle puts the clues together and ultimately goes up in a hot air balloon to reveal the flattened area is actually Vincent Van Goat’s latest artistic endeavor./When flying potatoes are dropping from the sky in Busytown, Huckle and gang are determined to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Ever tried making a hay tower? Well Monkey did only not very successfully and when it was time to clean things up he got some unexpected help from his friend the horse. Horse was eager to play Monkey’s favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey wants to build himself a new house, when the first try doesnt end well he decides to use rocks. To his big surprise one of these rocks turns out to be no other then his friend Turtle! Well, a visit from a friend is always a good reason to play Monkey’s favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Trevor leads a group hike to the beaver dam and Pontypandy Mountain, but without using a compass or a map either.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Trevor leads a group hike to the beaver dam and Pontypandy Mountain, but without using a compass and soon without a map, either!

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: Franklin and his friends embark on an exciting school project to write the songs for an upcoming musical pageant about the four seasons, with the help of the musical Beavers. But when every idea Franklin and Snail get for their spring song seems to be already taken by one of the other groups, they struggle with the assignment. It is only through true perseverance do they finally hit upon their very own unique idea – a spring song that celebrates all the seasons!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Rosie, Woodsy and Scoutbadger have plans to go play with their friends, but before they go, they must bring back mushrooms for dinner. The twins grab their map indicating their secret spots to pick up mushrooms, but Rosie makes fun of them: she doesn’t need a map, thanks to her super fox sense of smell! She heads one way and the badgers go another. But none of themcan find a single mushroom worth eating!

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What is the perfect transportation to enjoy the countryside? Doodleboo explains to Sketchy how to drawn a tractor.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who has the most extraordinary costume in the savannah? Doodleboo explains to Sketchy how to draw a Zebra

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Who is little but knows how to defend himself? Doodleboo explains how to draw a Crab

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty shows Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave how to take perfect photographs of Speedy Sheep, Sneezy Sheep and Little Lamb for their aunt’s photo album. But there’s so much to remember to get that perfect shot: make sure your subject is happy and smiling, frame your picture with the subject in the centre, don’t cover the lens and hold your camera steady to avoid getting blurry images!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Hatty, Tweet and Dave help Ruff-Ruff make up a story about pirates! Captain Ruff-Ruff, Pirate Dave and Princess Pirate Tweet go in search of treasure on Desert Island, singing a pirate song as they go. Ruff-Ruff want to dig for buried treasure, but his pirate crew find a treasure chest, filled with all their favourite things, aboard a real pirate ship! The pirates agree to share the treasure and Hatty records Ruff-Ruff’s story in a special storybook.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Summer is at its hottest and Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse want to run and play but the sun is just too hot and strong. That’s until Little Grey Squirrel gives them both a wonderful present, big leafy parasols. When he later changes his mind and takes Little Nutbrown Hare’s parasol back, the little hare is naturally disappointed. Can the friends find a way for all of them to be happy?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: You Summer in the meadow is a great time to find tasty snacks to eat. Big Nutbrown Hare seems to know all the best tricks and hiding spots for the yummy treats and Little Nutbrown Hare can’t help but wish he was as big and smart as his father. However, he soon finds out that there are some things a little Nutbrown Hare can teach a Big Nutbrown Hare.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On Summer’s hottest night Little Nutbrown Hare finds it hard to sleep. When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When Coco and Charlie come to play at Bings house they measure how tall he is, but when they get the measuring ritual wrong, Bing is scared hes growing down!

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is disappointed he cant go play because hes all sneezy but Sula and Amma bring him a nice carroty bagel to help him get better.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing Hide And Seek at the crèche with Sula, Pando and Coco. Bing doesn’t go to the toilet with all the others before the game starts and when he needs to go before he is found he has to decide whether to give up his hiding place or try and hold on.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are making ginger bunny biscuits for Charlie and Coco.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is "Its a Bing thing!" which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: A great storm tears down the fireflies house. The whole house breaks into peaces and all the lanterns with it. So the small firefiles go on a journey to find the wise old Shining Bug, and ask him to give them new lanterns. When the fireflies return home they are surprised by their new home, the forest friends have built them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: On a spring day, Flutter meets a group of unknown butterfly girls. The girls are happy, energetic and skitty, and Flutter is in awe of them at first. But it turns out the group always makes fun of Flutters real friends. So Flutter decides to choose her peacful way of life besides her friends.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Ant Queen has just recovered from a long sickness, so the ants decide to build her a giant Ferris Wheel on top of the hill. The work isnt going as fast as theyve planned, so the forest friends decide to help them. The work still goes slowly, so they sadly give up, but then the night stars arrive to help the group, and the Ferris Wheel is finally complete.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The three bark beetles cant decide what costume to wear to the spring carnival party. So they ask the help of Leapy. Since she also still hasnt gotten a costume yet, they come up with the idea to dress as the four seasons. Leapy becomes Spring, and the three bark beetles become Summer, Fall and Winter. The four seasonelves go on to win the costume contest at the party.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids find some numbered papers blowing around the park. After investigating several possibilities of where they could be from, they finally figure out they were once fastened to trees in the park as part of a self-guided tour to celebrate Arbor Day. / When all the milk in Huckle’s Dad’s store turns out to be sour, Huckle, Sally and Lowly set out to find out why.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey is hungry, oh so hungry, but he cannot find anything to eat, when all of a sudden, a nut falls from above followed by another and another…it is Squirrel, his good friend! Seeing how fast Squirrel moves around, Monkey is inspired to play his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Its the Pontypandy Animal Parade at Annies Farm, and Peter and Norman want to join in by rounding Lambikins and Woolly.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: For Norman’s new webcast, Hannah and Norman try to get Joe to do silly things on camera, but they’re foiled by Miss Pawdry every time!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s dad gives her a big empty box to play with! In Mimiloo, Tack can’t think of any new inventions—his Big Idea Board and his Big Idea Box are empty. To help Tack get out of his inventing slump, Kate and Mim-Mim have to help him imagine all the things that his empty box can become.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate discovers that Mom finished sewing Mim-Mim on the day Kate was born, so they share a birthday! In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim secretly set out to throw each other surprise parties. They each try to make it the very best party for the other, which means altering their friends’ party plans, disappointing their friends and making a gigantic mess!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Tchoupi and Nina come across a waddling hedgehog while they’re playing in the vegetable garden. When their moms explain how beneficial these cute little creatures are to gardens, the two friends decide to do everything they can to make the hedgehog feel at home among the vegetables… Until the little animal… disappears!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi comes down for breakfast this particular morning, he finds the kitchen in a total mess! Nina comes and tells him that the vegetable garden has also been turned upside down! Who could possibly have done this?... At first, they suspect Ciboulette the cat… until they find out that the culprit is a super cute newcomer.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia has caught mousie pox. Doctor Spotty is sorry but she is not allowed to see Sam anymore for a few days, and get bored alone in her room. How can she play with her friend without disobey?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam has agreed to water Mr. Grumpys flowers. When they enters Mr. Grumpys empty apartment, Sam and Julia discover that Mr. Grumpy has some hidden reasons for being so withdrawn...

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Rupert has always dreamed of living in the woods. And Tilda thinks wishes like that should be fulfilled. So Tilda, Rupert and Molly set out to spend a night in the forest. Rupert is amused by all the luggage the ladies are taking with them – for him, the woods have everything one could need! He soon discovers that its not that easy...

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: When the Triplets are going to the beach, Turbulent offers to carry the umbrella but it seems too heavy for him and Mommy asks him if he wants help. But no ! « I am strong » answers Turbulent. Then comes the lifeguard to help them, he is super strong with giant muscles and Turbulent is very impressed. Plus, the lifeguard has won the "Mister Beach" competition. It’s decided, Turbulent will do exactly the same. He decides to start exercising, doing a lot of push ups and weightlifting. But sport is really hard. And Turbulent would rather play with his brother and sister.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are having fun in the park with Toto when the dog suddenly rushes after Mrs Gzells cat, well actually rather after the cookie the cat had in its mouth. He runs like the wind and for the Triplets, Toto is THE Champion. But Mrs Gzell replies that if he’s so strong like they say, he should take part to the dog championship the next day. The Triplets are sure Toto will win everything, the competition of snoring, of barking and even the eating contest. Unfortunately, when the competition begins, those are not the challenges the Triplets were expecting.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Right before they go to bed, the Fox-Badger family dreamily gazes at the snowflakes falling from the sky. Berry would like togo out and build a snowman, but its late. Scoutbadger, Woodsy and Rosie promise that they will make one all together the next morning… Alas! When they wake up the next day, they realize that the snow has already melted.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillous friends come to his house for a fun and spooky Halloween party.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou has been tasked with reading Rosie a bedtime story. Hetells her classic fairytales, with a Caillou-twist, but gets tooexcited and spooks her with stories of bears and wolves - wakingRosie up instead of putting her to sleep. Finally, he gets luckywhen he combines all the tales into one special story.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Its Darcy to the rescue when Monty falls down an old mine shaft while working on the new visitors park.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The trainees are doing a sign-reading exercise. If they work as a team and follow the signs correctly - there’ll be a wonderful surprise at the end of it. The trainees start off together, but Koko and Wilson quickly lose patience with Brewster - he’s so methodical, that it’s slowing them up! The friends have a bit of a falling out, and Wilson and Koko race on ahead guessing at the outcome of the course without waiting for the final clue. But Brewster’s approach is the right one and his patience is rewarded when he finds the surprise - a private screening of a new Action Engine movie at the ride - in theatre!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The trainees are taking their passenger test. If they pass, they’ll be able to carry passengers all on their own. Brewster and Wilson are a little nervous, but Koko is confident - after all, she’s a passenger train! Mr. Simkins, from the Ministry of Chuggers, arrives to examine them. His ‘jiggleometer’ will tell him whether or not the trainees are riding smoothly. Koko volunteers to go first. Unfortunately, just as she starts, Simkins coughs and sets the machine off with a deafening beep.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Charley and his friends were surprised when they came back from a walk in the forest to find a baby hedgehog curled up in Lilys bag. They nicknamed him PicPic and hid him in the vegetable garden, because if Medhi found out about his existence, hed want to take him back to the forest straight away! So, unbeknownst to their host, the friends take it in turns to look after him. But PicPic... disappears!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave help Mr and Mrs Rabbit and the three Little Bunnies move to a new burrow. But Littlest Bunny doesn’t want to go; and keeping track of all the bunnies’ belongings turns out to be hard work. Tweet has to reassure Littlest Bunny that his favourite cuddly carrot toy will be delivered safely and that he will love his new home.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: What can help Sketchy to become a sledding champion? Doodleboo explains how to draw a penguin.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah faces a perilous climb up the Caucasus Mountain, encountering an agitated East Caucasian Tur that leaves her stranded on a ledge. Meanwhile, in the garden, Leo is attempting to break his own time record of climbing a tree but a call from Farah interrupts him. Farah fills them in on her dangerous situation so Leo, Katie, and Hero rush to her aid. Upon arrival, they rescue Farah but discover a distressed baby tur on another lower ledge on that same mountain. They try to get close to it but the protective mother tur charges to them, endangering herself at the edge of the mountaintop. They meet Ranger Rocky who calls up Ranger Joey to know more about the tur. With insights from Ranger Joey, they devise a plan using bilberry branches to lure the mother tur away, enabling Leo to safely rescue the stranded baby. The heartwarming reunion of turs at the mountains summit marks the success of their mission, celebrated with a photo in the treehouse. In the garden Hero, attempting to climb a tree branch, comically finds himself stuck and Leo slides down to save him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Alfonso, the cricket, plays beautifully on his violin for the forest inhabitants, but one day, no one listens to his new piece. First, he looks for Berry, Balthazar, and Stanley, but they are busy. He goes to Dolly, but she doesn’t have time either. Very discouraged, he decides to leave the forest. However, he meets the Magpie, who welcomes him and cheers him up. Meanwhile, the others begin to search for Alfonso. When they find him, they apologize and invite him to play his new piece at the playground opening.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One autumn day, Reggie Squirrel is visited by his old friend, Otto Badger, who brings a frisbee as a gift. They happily play with it, and when they head home, the frisbee falls at the base of a tree. Later, Berry and his friends find it and play with it, but Balthazar throws it so far that the frisbee vanishes. Reggie Squirrel asks them about it later, but Balthazar denies having seen it. Dolly and Flutter find the frisbee and bring it back to Reggie. Berry, feeling ashamed, admits that they accidentally threw the frisbee and couldnt find it. In the end, they all play happily with it until dark, carefully making sure not to throw it too far.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Leapy, the grasshopper girl, gets paint on her hair while painting her house in the spring. She can’t wash it off, so Zephyr, the dragonfly, offers to cut her hair. Leapy is very sad when she sees herself in the mirror; she doesn’t like her new hairstyle. At Zephyrs suggestion, they show the others, but only Dolly notices the change and compliments her. Later, they hold a hairstyle day, where everyone creates special hairstyles for themselves. Leapy happily finishes painting her house and invites her friends to a spring feast.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Stanleys birthday is approaching, and he becomes very curious and can’t wait to find out what gift he will receive from Dolly. He peeks into the ladybird girls drawer. The next day, he tells Balthazar that he knows what his gift will be. On his birthday, the friends gather and wish Stanley a happy birthday. Flutter presents the cake, they sing, and then Stanley blows out the candles and cuts the cake. Stanley receives many nice gifts, including a bowling set from Dolly. Stanley admits that he peeked into the ladybird girls drawer because he was curious about his gift.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Shaun invites his friends to Sand Island during the summer heatwave. Christopher and Chloe, the two canaries, ferry the friends over. Bubble, Balthazar, Dolly, Stanley, Berry, Flutter, and Shaun build sand houses. Balthazar accidentally knocks down Bubble the flower beetles house. Suddenly, a summer shower begins and washes away all the sand houses. They stand sadly around their ruined creations and decide to build a large drip sandcastle together. Side by side, they build drip towers, construct castle walls, and decorate the tops with sand balls. The day passes joyfully, and by the evening, when the canaries come to pick them up, magnificent drip towers stand tall on the island.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: During Bing’s bedtime routine he inadvertently pees on his blankie and it’s too wet to wash and dry before bed. Fortunately his Hoppity Voosh toy has a cape just as soft and huggy as blankie and it even smells just right too.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Coco shows Bing how to do really good Big Boos and together they make Flop jump. When Bing tries out his new tricks on Charlie he finds out the power of Boo has to be scaled down for babies.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma’s crèche, a talking ride on car. It seems like fun until Talkie Taxi keeps saying the same thing over and over again. When the taxi crashes and is finally silenced Bing and Sula use their imagination to play a game they really want to play without being dictated to by the noisy taxi.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its a windy day, and Bing wants to fly his Hoppity Voosh kite with Flop.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apples rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberrys new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberrys stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberrys reputation, proclaims its delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apples review and orders Strawberrys new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Scoutbadger cant find a gift for Berrys birthday, so he"borrows" a blue boat from Woodsy. It lies at the bottom of his trunk, so he thinks his brother doesnt use it anymore. He swaps this boat with a box in the shape of a heart belonging to Biva, the ideal gift for his little sister. But there’s a reason why Woodsy’s boat was at the bottom of the trunk: he was trying to hide it to keep it safe, as it was precisely what he was planning to give his sister!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You

However, he soon finds out that there are some things a little Nutbrown Hare can teach a Big Nutbrown Hare.

When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Boribon has received a new storybook and asks Annalee to read him the story. However, Annalee has lots to do, so she goes shopping. While she’s away, it turns out that Boribon is also capable of helping her. When Annalee returns, she is in for a big surprise: Boribon has helped with everything!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Grandma offers Sam and Julia a curious calendar representing the Mouse Mansion, each numbered window revealing an apartment the way it was long ago when its inhabitant first arrived.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are watching a detective series on television before going to bed and they are fascinated by Sherlocks knack for solving enigmas. So when Poet cannot find his cuddly bear the next morning he decides to conduct an investigation. The kids search the entire apartment for evidence, with their magnifying glass, but in vain. They go to the bakery, then to the park and ask passersby for their help but still not a trace of the bear. It is finally Toto and his great sense of smell that will lead them to the cuddly toy, which was simply bundled up in Poets blanket.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are thrilled: Eliott is coming over to babysit them tonight and they want him to tell them a scary story. But as the story goes along the kids are more and more frightened and prefer going to bed without hearing the end. How can they avoid nightmares? How about setting a net around their beds, using a magic cuddly bear or invoking a protective fairy? Suddenly they hear a loud noise in the apartment! Phew, it is only mom. The Triplets are really glad she is home.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The chuggineers have a busy day ahead. They need to repair the damage caused by a fire at the lighthouse, and fix some track out near the river. Fletch is keen to impress Zack and show him how responsible he is, so he offers to take care of the work at the lighthouse, while the others fix the track - but he soon discovers that being in charge is hard. He wastes valuable time on things that shouldn’t concern him, and then forgets to pick up the hook he needs for the crane. Running out of time, he rushes and carelessly drops the lighthouse roof into the sea.

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate’s family trip to the zoo is canceled when it starts raining. In Mimiloo, Kate and Mim-Mim help their pals make their own zoo animals out of bushes and hedges. But after a spritz, the animals come alive, and things quickly get a little too wild!

programme.title: Kate And Mim Mim
programme.desc: Kate needs to find four purple buttons for plushy Mim-Mim’s new sweater, but there are so many to look through, it’s going to take a long time. In Mimiloo, Gobble uses Tack’s Copy-Zapper to duplicate popper peach trees so he can make the biggest batch of popper peach jam ever. But things get messy when Boomer duplicates himself!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou is frustrated when he can’t score a basket in his new basketball hoop. After pretending he’s in charge of a space mission, guiding a shuttle pilot (Mommy) into a moon crater, Caillou learns to slow down and take a breath. This helps him finally score a basket!

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: When Caillou cant get the steps right to a block party line dance, he worries he’ll ruin the dance for everyone. But Grandmas story about square dancing for a famous square dance caller (Caillou) helps Caillou overcome his anxiety and dance the night away.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When snow strands Spencer on Sodor, he delights in boasting to the other engines by talking about meeting the abominable snowman, which frightens Henry. The next day Spencer is reluctantly put to work helping Henry and he delights in teasing Henry about the abominable snowman again, taking every opportunity to play up his fear, but when they meet a man covered from head to toe in snow, it is Spencer who is the most frightened of all and it is Henry out tries to protect him. Luckily the snow covered man turns out to be the Fat Controller.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: ‘We’re under attack by aliens!’ or so Kai thinks when he finds a mysterious crop circle underwater. They later realise that the hardworking white-spotted pufferfish is responsible for the intricate circle, but an uncontactable Kai is already on his way to destroy it, thinking it would prevent an alien attack. The rangers are on it!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kai needs a photo of the majestic Golden Pheasant for a photography competition. But no flash photography please!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: The Junior Rangers are caught in a sandstorm! Leo grabs Hero and escapes with the other rangers... except he didnt actually grab Hero. He grabbed a Fennec Fox instead!

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat is asked to deliver a huge block of ice to Michael for the Chinese summer festival.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat delivers a precious Indian elephant to Meera for her school show and tell.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula find a potato in Amma’s vegetable patch with a comical ‘face’, so they take it under their wing, naming it “Nosey”. The two children look after Nosey and show him around the crèche but unfortunately Nosey goes down the slide too quickly and his ‘nose’ falls off. Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies but he doesnt want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop hear the familiar jingle of Gillys ice cream van and race across the park to find her. After a long run Bing finally gets his ice cream but as he waves goodbye to Gilly he tips the ice cream out of the cone.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: In the absence of a real plaster, Bing makes one out of sticky tape, but it’s so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing loves Arlo the cat. They are friends. Bing strokes the kitty and they play hide and seek, but what happens when Bing meets a cat that isnt as friendly?

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald volunteers to make a special birthday cake for Catrina’s birthday party. Madame Butterfly says that all Catrina needs is a small simple cake. However, Oswald ends up making a huge birthday cake, eight tiers in total, with a tiny cupcake on top. After a collision with the Egg twins en route to the party Oswald ends up with just the cupcake – perfect for baby Catrina!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald is playing the piano, with Weenie beside him, when they hear a drip drip dripping noise. Oswald investigates only to discover it is a leaking tap in the kitchen. Oswald tries to fix it with his spanner but the pipe bursts and water floods Big City!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Mila is appearing on the children’s TV game show, “Whiz-A-Quiz”, the rest of the Spring City Rockets are disappointed that they didn’t get tickets to watch and support her. This gives Mayor Madison the idea for Bob to build an outdoor movie area at the Stadium where everyone can watch the game show together. But when Mayor Madison asks Lofty to help the Spring City Rockets decorate the stadium, he gets carried away and leaves Leo to finish the support frames for the giant screen all by himself. A job that is too big for one person. When the giant screen arrives, the frame isn’t sturdy enough to hold it and the whole structure starts falling apart. Lofty races in and saves the TV screen but the frame, stage and audience seating are broken.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: JJ and Mila are training for a snowboarding stunt show to be performed at the opening of the Winter in Spring Festival - a celebration of winter in Spring City. Bob and the team will be building a triple chairlift to transport passengers to the top of Observatory Hill. But Bob isn’t keen on the cold weather - he’d much prefer to be building sandcastles on the beach! During a work break, Skye offers Bob a snowboarding lesson - and he’s terrible! Meanwhile, Scoop is determined to have a slide down the snowy hill - but Wendy warns him that without snow chains, he’ll have no control. Scoop can’t resist... and ends up sliding all over the slope and crashing into a support beam, causing the chairlift cable to jump off the wheel tracks.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse go on a long trip with Big Nutbrown Hare to find some food he hid away during the warmer months. Little Nutbrown Hare plays with a stick along the way, which turns out to have many uses, one of which is helping them find the food and another is finding their way home again.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is very proud of a Christmas Tree he has built from pine cones. So proud, that when Little Field Mouse accidentally knocks it over he has trouble forgiving her. When he makes a mistake of his own, Big Nutbrown Hare forgives him immediately, and he understands how important it is to forgive.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game called ‘snow seek’. The friends have a lot of fun creating tracks for Little Nutbrown Hare to follow, but Little Redwood Fox’s tracks completely disappear and so does she. When Big Nutbrown Hare reports that Little Redwood Fox was sighted walking backwards, they work out how she managed to trick them all.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy likes football. What other things does Timmy like?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle and the gang race all over Busytown trying to find the lock that fits and old key they found. They search everywhere from the Busytown Museum to Mr Gronkle’s antiques. They come up empty until they remember that an old roll top desk was being delivered to the antique store near where they found the key and had a lock on it. They try the key and it fits. / Chocolate sauce on Lowlys car leaves Huckle and the gang puzzled.

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: After a button pressing accident at the Fab Food Factory, a giant popcorn is on the loose in Okido. Will Messy and Zoom be able to stop it before it flattens the city?

programme.title: Messy Goes to Okido
programme.desc: Messy borrows Zoes umbrella and it gets swept away by the rain. Messy and his friends go on a white water adventure down the drain in search for it!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Apple isnt paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling "Tall Tales." So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry decides to imitate his Mum by becoming a newspaper reporter for the day.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: When Harry is disappointed that he cant have what he wants for breakfast he goes to Dino-world.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the dense Borneo forest, Farah faces a daunting challenge as she attempts to conquer a fallen tree trunk. With determination and strength, she overcomes the obstacle, celebrating a fleeting triumph. However, her moment of victory quickly transforms into an unexpected stumble when a mischievous tree root thwarts her progress, sending her crashing to the ground. As Farah lifts her head, her gaze is met with a sight that stirs her empathy—a distressed animal in need of assistance. Filled with concern, she extends her hand to aid the creature, only to be met with a sharp snap, forcing her to retreat. Meanwhile, in a different setting, Leo and Katie cautiously approach their canine companion, Hero, who is blissfully engrossed in chewing his bone. Intriguingly, they inform Hero of a promised reward, but with a peculiar condition—he must don a blindfold. Intrigued and trusting, Hero agrees, and Leo skillfully secures the blindfold around his loyal friend, while Katie lifts him up. Together, they embark on an adventure that leads them to a bathtub filled with frothy bubbles, aiming to fulfill the enigmatic reward. However, a slight misstep by Leo, unintentionally triggering a rubber duckie, shatters their stealthy approach, alerting Hero to the unusual situation. In an instant, Hero darts away, prompting the Junior Rangers to pursue him relentlessly. Amidst the commotion, Leos phone rings, and he answers to find Farah on the line, urgently requesting their help with a distressed turtle.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: The Fat Controller sends Thomas to the docks to collect a very important Christmas parcel. Unfortunately Cranky drops it when he is unloading a ship and hearing the way the parcel rattles thinks it must be broken. He tries to hide it from Thomas so that nobody will find out what he’s done. But the Fat Controller does not give up so easily and neither does Thomas and with the help of Salty the parcel is soon discovered again. Thomas sets off to deliver it at last, but slips on the icy tracks, dislodging the parcel and thinks he must have broken it too. When the Fat Controller opens it the surprise turns out to be a surprise for Thomas and Cranky too!

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Kevin is very excited by the snow, but Victor doesn’t like it at all. He explains to Kevin that the snow is causing all sorts of trouble. Emily is stuck in the Steamworks, because the parts she is waiting for are on a truck that’s stuck in the snow at the depot. When Kevin goes outside some snow falls off the roof trapping him too. Victor thinks Kevin’s gone to try to fetch the truck from the depot and sets off to rescue his friend. Luckily Thomas has been sent to the depot too and is able to find Victor before anyone else gets stuck in the snow!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: As every year, Maria is set to take part in the pizza contest. But she sprains her wrist at the last moment and, unable to cook, cant participate. So David asks Grisu to cook in her stead. Its the perfect mission for Grisu, who loves pizza (and his father even more). Maria instructs him – and Stella – on how to make the Pizza Nonna, according to her grandmothers recipe. But things go haywire, Grisu unwittingly ends up tied to the ceiling fan, spinning fast, kicking everything and making a mess in the kitchen, plus he burns the recipe. As all hope seems lost, Grisu, who never gives up, has Maria sing a lullaby, which makes her remember the recipe. Thanks to that, they make the best pizza ever and go on to win the contest.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Toramento has to decorate Dragontown with flowers for its yearly ball. But as he got the flowers delivered too late, he wont be able to finish his task on time. So David asks Grisu to help out Toramento and be his assistant gardener. The young dragon is in charge of making flowerbed depicting a volcano in the town square – even though Fume would rather have his son use cactuses instead of flowers. Things dont go exactly as planned. First, the soil is too hard, and then Thingy unearths most flowers Grisu and Stella have managed to plant.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare discovers Little Field Mouse has a wonderful collection of interesting Autumn leaves and Little Grey Squirrel has a collection of acorns of all varieties, he decides to start a collection of his own. But Little Nutbrown Hare cant decide what to collect, until his father encourages him to realise that he has a wonderful collection of memories.

programme.title: La vie que jaime - Le pianiste Menahem Pressler
programme.desc: The music world has known Menahem Pressler for more than half a century and mainly for his work with the famous Beaux Arts Trio. He was the heart of this ensemble and when in 2008 the trio decided to separate, it was not the end for Menahem Pressler’s career – in fact it was the start of a most remarkable and successful path as a soloist and in 2013, the 90-year-old grand seigneur of the piano gave his long overdue debut with the Berliner Philharmoniker. In ‘The life I love – the pianist Menahem Pressler’, from talks with Pressler over excerpts from one of his Master Classes, to interviews with artists like Daniel Harding, Quatuor Ébène, Leonidas Kavakos or Daniel Hope, we will gain deep insights into the life of this enchantingly “venerable prodigy”. Menahem Pressler died on May 6, 2023Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Rivalites musicales - Callas contre Tebaldi
programme.desc: Maria Callas and Renata Tebaldi were the two most famous sopranos of the second half of the last century. Turned into hostile enemies by their admirers, the two became untouchable goddesses of opera. For their fans, Callas was known as "the tigress", Tebaldi as "the voice of an angel": the two singers could hardly have been more different, whether in their professional or private lives. To this day, Callas remains perhaps the greatest soprano of all time. Her rival, Tebaldi, is best known to opera lovers. Why is the posthumous fame of the two prima donnas so different?Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Richard Strauss et ses heroïnes
programme.desc: Divorce! After six years of marriage the choleric and chronically jealous Pauline, daughter of a general, has had enough of Richard Strauss. Pauline always knew it: her husband who at 36 is celebrated as the most important living German composer across the globe is cheating on her. His congeniality and moral uprightness is just a mask! Are his inspirations for the erotic escapades which are the basis of several of his tone poems and songs based on the love affairs of the artist? The film Richard Strauss and his Heroines goes on an exciting journey discovering the women in Strauss’ life. At the focus is primarily his relationship with Pauline, to whom he was married for over 55 years up to his death. Until today she applies as a harridan who often embarrassed her husband in public. It hereby falls under the table that Strauss at the beginning and the end of his relationship composed his finest songs for the trained singer who gave up her career for him and covered his back for the rest of his life. What was it that made the broken old man, who experienced the most varied of epochs in German history, from the Empire to the Nazi dictatorship to the post-war period, write in 1948 in his final song (“At Sunset”) one of the most moving declarations of love in the history of music: “We have through sorrow and joy gone hand in hand”? We visit Strauss last surviving grandchild in Garmisch and we meet the great Strauss singers Brigitte Fassbaender, Renee Fleming, Dame Gwyneth Jones and Christa Ludwig, who report on their famous Strauss roles. With the conductor Franz Welser-Most we research the secret of Strauss’ instrumentation genius.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Våren ar har och Port Protections invånare står infor en rad hinder och mojligheter. Squibb fixar en forbranningsugn for att losa samhallets avfallshanteringsproblem. Sam agerar dyklarare till nykomlingen Troy Brockway. Oliver och Breanna lar sig det verkliga vardet av sin nya båt, som de kopt utan att se den. Och Carl och Morgan kan inte langre ignorera sitt flytande hus som har borjat sjunka.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologerna undersoker Gizapyramidernas arv och de mystiska pyramider som foljde på dem. De jagar agaren till ett kolossalt begravningsschakt som skar rakt igenom det forntida begravningsfaltet i Abusir, undersoker en utsmyckad grav nara farao Djedkares pyramid i Saqqara och graver ut farao Sahures forvunna grav – den enda pyramidgraven i Egypten som annu inte utforskats.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: I skuggan av den stora pyramiden graver ett team arkeologer under ledning av dr Mark Lehner fram vad som kan vara det viktigaste kungliga palatset i det gamla Egypten. Genom att grava under en overgiven fotbollsplan hittar teamet ett spår av ledtrådar som avslojar ett centrum for byggandet av sjalva den stora pyramiden.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations overvakar ett fordon som lastar av narkotika på en parkeringsplats och jagar foraren nar han flyr till fots. Efter ett tips hittas en andra kokaingomma i ett forråd. CBP hittar guldmynt, en antik grekisk mask och en egyptisk artefakt i paket på JFK, och upptacker kokain gomt i vaxellådan på en lastbil i Rio Grande Valley.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations genomfor en operation for att stoppa forfalskade varor, vilket leder till ett stort beslag i Kansas City och en razzia i en lagenhet fylld med tusentals sneakers i Cali, Colombia. I Newark får tullen information om en passagerare som reser till Grekland med resvaskor fyllda med marijuana till ett varde av 200 000 dollar och de hittar kokain inuti ett fordon.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Sommaren 1940 hade Hitlers nazitrupper erovrat Frankrike, och hans nasta mål skulle bli Storbritannien. Det maktiga Luftwaffe skickas for att bomba britterna till kapitulation, utplåna Royal Air Force och forbereda en sjoinvasion. Vi kan nu avsloja de flygplans- och skeppsvrak som berattar sanningen om hur Storbritannien stod emot naziinvasionen och besegrade Hitler i slaget om Storbritannien.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Skottland for att putsa upp en Lancia Fulvia, årsmodell 1968. Det har italienska masterverket till bil tillhor f.d. hårfrisoren Bill som kopte den 1984. Efter att ha drabbats av flera svåra sjukdomar på rad ber Bills familj nu om hjalp från Car SOS att rusta upp hans ogonsten och sprida lite valbehovlig gladje i hans liv igen.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Yorkshire for att hamta ett akutfall – en traktor av marke Ferguson från 1953. Bonden Andrews familj har agt ”Fergie” sedan den var ny, och har efter ett svårt år kontaktat SOS-teamet for att se om de kan hjalpa till att restaurera slaktklenoden. Sedan Tim och Fuzz tagit med den till verkstaden inser de emellertid att ingen av dem har en aning om hur en traktor fungerar.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: I augusti 1944 narmar sig de allierade återstoden av den tyska armen i Normandie. Med cirka hundratusen soldater, vapen och stridsvagnar skapar de den sk. Falaisefickan. Men en liten lucka i de allierades linjer ger fienden en chans att fly. En liten kanadensisk skvadron måste hålla linjen under standigt okad press från tyskarna.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: I december 1944 inleder Hitler den okanda Operation Wacht am Rhein under vilket hans stridsvagnar gor ett desperat flyktforsok mot hamnen i Antwerpen. Det ar upptakten till vad som senare blivit kant som Ardenneroffensiven. Amerikanska fallskarmssoldater ur 505:e infanteriregementet landar i Ardennerna for att sakra en livsviktig bro mot en nazistyrka, med order att forsvara den till varje pris.

programme.title: Europas blodiga historia
programme.desc: Tudorhistorikern dr Suzannah Lipscomb och journalisten Joe Crowley slår sig samman for att undersoka de extraordinara berattelserna om tre av Europas mest obehagliga figurer, från en av Roms mest fruktade kejsare till Ungerns egen Greve Dracula. Forst tar man sig en titt på varfor den unge kejsar Caligula, med hela det romerska imperiet vid sina fotter, styrde sitt imperium genom fruktan och galenskap. Darefter undersoker man hur en dekorerad fransk krigshjalte forvandlades till en okand barnamordare, samt faktan kring hur en åldrande ungersk anka blev kand som ”grevinnan Dracula”.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: En stor lastbil skar av ett helt samhalle. Kristoffer får det tufft då en sopbil valter på de hala vagarna.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna utnyttjar det ovanliga och valkomna mildvadret for att oka vinterns overlevnadschanser.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Denna spektakulara luftfard avslojar Norge på ett helt nytt satt. Flygande kameror avslojar tekniken bakom varldens langsta undervattenskabel, svavar over huskies och fångar Norges mest tursamma brevbarare på hans fantastiska rutt från o till o. Langs detta enorma och vilda landskap som formats av glaciarer avslojar vi den revolutionerande arkitektur som forvandlar Norges kust.

programme.title: Europa från ovan
programme.desc: Denna spektakulara flygtur skildrar Danmark så som du aldrig sett det forr. Flygande kameror avslojar ett toppmodernt kraftverk med en skidbacke på taket, svavar ovanfor en parad vid kungafamiljens elitgarde och skildrar reparationer på unika byggnader. Vi utforskar de många oar som utgor denna lilla nation och ett slott som inspirerat Shakespeare till hans pjas ”Hamlet”.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Efter att ha lyft under en storm kraschar en ny 737:a over vastra Afrika och en internationell utredargrupp anlander snart till Kamerun. Kenya Airlines flight 507 har kraschat i ett mangrovetrask och ligger nedsjunket i lera och vatten. Fastan utredarna lyckas identifiera det fatala misstag som utloste tragedin avslojar de också en dodlig rad problem.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Cathay Pacific Flight 780 ar på vag från Indonesien till Hongkong och flyger hogt over Sydkinesiska havet nar flygplanets båda motorer går sonder och forvandlar deras Airbus A330 till ett segelflygplan på 200 ton. Kaptenen ropar mayday på radion – och fast besluten att undvika en katastrofal landning i havet – tar han over manuell kontroll av flygplanet och lyckas få kraft i en motor genom att mycket långsamt oka gasen. Men sen låter inte den krånglande motorn honom sakta ner planet for landning.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: I sodra Norge tvingas Thord, Bjoern och deras man ut i en av det senaste decenniets varsta stormar. De måste undsatta en lastbil full med stålbalkar, som stormvindar tvingat av vagen. Val på jobbet ger Bjoern Svein Arne en lektion i tyngdlagen. I norr skickar Jo Roger ut fjolårets nykomling, Stig på hans forsta solouppdrag for sasongen.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern hamnar under press nar en frontalkrock mellan två lastbilar blockerar en ambulans under en nodutryckning. Thord jobbar hela natten for att undsatta en forare som sitter fast i sin lastbil och måste få sin last till flygplatsen i tid. I norr overvakar Stig undsattningen av en 30 ton tung lastbil som kort rakt igenom sakerhetsstaketet och hamnar farligt nara en elstolpe.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Vi avslojar några av varldens varsta byggkatastrofer och utforskar en kollapsad italiensk stormarknad, brander på nojesparker, en katastrofal tunnelkollaps i Indien som fångade arbetare, Kanadas problemtyngda spårvag och ett stadiontak som blåste bort i en orkan. Senare tittar vi på hur husbyggande har blivit felaktigt på grund av bly.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: En tankbil full med avfall glider bakåt på en smal, isig backe och krockar nastan med en snotackt bil. Det ar en svår situation som tvingar Thord att anvanda sin latta pickup – men ett enda misstag kan forvandla raddningsaktionen till en katastrof. I Overhalla stannar bargaren Marius till vid Jo Rogers verkstad på sin resa soderut. Men nar besoket avbryts av ett nodrop bjuder Jo Roger in Marius att delta i raddningsaktionen. Det som var en tio minuters kaffepaus forvandlas till en hård natts arbete.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar ett jordskred forstor en gravmaskin på en avlagsen skogsvag, slår Thord och Bjoern sig samman. Men nar den instabila marken hotar raddningsinsatsen forvandlas uppdraget till en tolv dagar lång utmaning. I Odda, efter annu ett jordskred, fruktar Domenic att falla i vattnet nar han forsoker radda en bil som har spolats ut i fjorden. Tusen kilometer norrut, i Overhalla, hamnar Torstein i dubbelt trubbel nar en lastbil och en bil krockar på samma plats.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: China Eastern Airlines 583 ar på en nattflygning från Peking till Los Angeles nar planet dyker och stiger så kraftigt att två passagerare dodas och 150 skadas. Besattningen lyckas omdirigera flygplanet till en topphemlig bas for US Air Force på en avlagsen o i Alaska. Utredarna hittar inga spår av turbulens och sokandet efter orsaken till den dodliga berg-och-dalbanan i skyn fortsatter.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Våren ar har och Port Protections invånare står infor en rad hinder och mojligheter. Squibb fixar en forbranningsugn for att losa samhallets avfallshanteringsproblem. Sam agerar dyklarare till nykomlingen Troy Brockway. Oliver och Breanna lar sig det verkliga vardet av sin nya båt, som de kopt utan att se den. Och Carl och Morgan kan inte langre ignorera sitt flytande hus som har borjat sjunka.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I Port Protection måste invånarna forlita sig på såval hjarna som hjarta om de vill overlista Moder Natur. Oliver och Breanna ger sig ut på sin forsta bjornjakt. Curly hjalper Morgan falla sitt forsta trad. Sam anvander vetenskap for att forbattra planteringsjorden, och Mary hittar på en ny metod att tillaga sin fisk.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: I skuggan av den stora pyramiden graver ett team arkeologer under ledning av dr Mark Lehner fram vad som kan vara det viktigaste kungliga palatset i det gamla Egypten. Genom att grava under en overgiven fotbollsplan hittar teamet ett spår av ledtrådar som avslojar ett centrum for byggandet av sjalva den stora pyramiden.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer graver ut den outforskade gravkammaren i en gammal pyramid i hopp om att hitta den 4 400 år gamla kungens mumie och hans skatter. Ingen modern arkeolog har till fullo utforskat Sahurepyramiden som har drabbats av en katastrofal kollaps inuti. Dr Mohamed Ismail Khaled och hans team tar sig an den farliga uppgiften att roja undan rasmassorna och gor upptackter for livet.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations genomfor en operation for att stoppa forfalskade varor, vilket leder till ett stort beslag i Kansas City och en razzia i en lagenhet fylld med tusentals sneakers i Cali, Colombia. I Newark får tullen information om en passagerare som reser till Grekland med resvaskor fyllda med marijuana till ett varde av 200 000 dollar och de hittar kokain inuti ett fordon.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations genomfor flera operationer under tackmantel for narkotikahandel och beslagtar både metamfetamin och fentanyl. Tull- och gransbevakningen samarbetar med jordbruksspecialister i Atlanta for att stoppa farliga livsmedel från att komma in i landet. På JFK har de misstankar om en intern flygbolagskonspiration, och hittar kokain gomt i havregryn från Guatemala.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Det kan finnas så många som 100 000 skepp på Östersjons botten, men det mest imponerande av dem alla ar kanske slagskeppet Mars som forsvann for mer an 450 år sedan under sin andra dag till havs. Spår efter det legendariska skeppet upptacktes nyligen utanfor Sveriges kust och de allra forsta fynden skvallrar om att hon mer an val lever upp till de många myter som omgardat henne.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz reser till Yorkshire for att hamta ett akutfall – en traktor av marke Ferguson från 1953. Bonden Andrews familj har agt ”Fergie” sedan den var ny, och har efter ett svårt år kontaktat SOS-teamet for att se om de kan hjalpa till att restaurera slaktklenoden. Sedan Tim och Fuzz tagit med den till verkstaden inser de emellertid att ingen av dem har en aning om hur en traktor fungerar.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Car SOS, programmet som gor verklighet av motordrommar, ar tillbaka – nu storre an någonsin. Fuzz Townshend och Tim Shaw fortsatter sitt kall att soka upp agare till skamfilade veteranbilar, restaurera dem och overraska de valfortjanta agarna med det fantastiska resultatet. I denna åttonde sasong tar duon itu med en japansk superbil, en tysk sportkupe och en brittisk rallyvinnare bl.a.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: I december 1944 inleder Hitler den okanda Operation Wacht am Rhein under vilket hans stridsvagnar gor ett desperat flyktforsok mot hamnen i Antwerpen. Det ar upptakten till vad som senare blivit kant som Ardenneroffensiven. Amerikanska fallskarmssoldater ur 505:e infanteriregementet landar i Ardennerna for att sakra en livsviktig bro mot en nazistyrka, med order att forsvara den till varje pris.

programme.title: Hitlers sista faste
programme.desc: Efter att ha tagit sig i land med det fransk-kanadensiska Chaudiereregimentet på D-dagen, forlorar prickskytten Leo Major delvis synen under slaget om Caen. Han vagrar att återvanda hem och återansluter sig till sitt regemente. I april 1944 anmaler han sig som frivillig for att forsoka få kontakt med hollandska motståndsrorelsen i Zwolle och lyckas frita staden utan ett enda civilt dodsoffer.

programme.title: Europas blodiga historia
programme.desc: Tudorhistorikern dr Suzannah Lipscomb och journalisten Joe Crowley beger sig in i de morka konsternas varld och undersoker du kusliga berattelserna om Europas dodgravare, haxor och getryttare. Forst undersoker man dodgravarna i en stad vid namn Frankenstein, som kan har orsakat (eller inte?) spridandet av pesten med hjalp av pulvriserade lik. Darefter undersoker man den fruktansvarda historien om en aktad kirurg som kan ha varit ledaren for ett djavulsdyrkande gang tjuvar. Till sist åker teamet till Spanien for att undersoka hur en liten baskisk by blev platsen for den storsta haxjakten i Spaniens historia.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Programmet foljer norska bilbargningshjaltar som finns dar nar lastbilar stoter på problem på sin vag genom den forradiska norska bergsterrangen.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Vintern har anlant och och med den en brådska att samla in alla återstående fornodenheter. Efter några misslyckade jakter, beger sig Gary djupt in i vildmarken på jakt efter hjort. Curly hjalper sin van att hugga ner hennes forsta doda trad till brasved. Sam bygger en vedspis åt nykomlingen Amanda så att hon har en varmekalla på sin husbåt. Och Porters ber en av Alaskas pionjarer att overse deras vedstapel.

programme.title: Tutankhamuns skatter
programme.desc: Experter undersoker en mystisk jarndolk, rekonstruerar gyllene dekorationer och anvander bildteknik på Tukankhamuns begravningsklader.

programme.title: Tutankhamuns skatter
programme.desc: Modern teknologi avslojar nya hemligheter om artefakterna från kung Tukankhamuns grav, inklusive hans guldmask, begravningsbadd och avbildning.

programme.title: Tutankhamuns skatter
programme.desc: Av de tusentals skatter som hittades i Tutankhamons grav ger två små mumifierade spadbarn kanske storst insikt i den unge kungens liv och dod. Fastan forskare lange kant till att de två barnen var kungens dodfodda barn avslojar ytterligare gentester skrackinjagande insikter i de bisarra metoder som holl faraons dynasti kvar vid makten.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Bara några hundra meter over okenlandskapet utanfor Reno flyger sex enmotoriga jaktflygplan från andra varldskriget som ska medverka i en flygtavling. På marken har 30 000 åskådare samlats. De flyger i en 13 km lång ovalformation i nara 720 km/h. Den lokala legenden Jimmy Leeward tavlar i en ombyggd P-51 Mustang som dopts till The Galloping Ghost. Han ar fast besluten att slå ett nytt hastighetsrekord men mitt i loppet vander planet plotsligt uppåt, han tappar kontrollen och kraschar rakt ner i asfalten framfor åskådarlaktarna. Det ar en av tidernas varsta krascher under en flygtavling och haveriutredarna tar hjalp av pilotens narmaste vanner for att forsoka forstå vad som gick så fel.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Bjoern hamnar under press nar en frontalkrock mellan två lastbilar blockerar en ambulans under en nodutryckning. Thord jobbar hela natten for att undsatta en forare som sitter fast i sin lastbil och måste få sin last till flygplatsen i tid. I norr overvakar Stig undsattningen av en 30 ton tung lastbil som kort rakt igenom sakerhetsstaketet och hamnar farligt nara en elstolpe.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Thord and Bjoern face the ultimate rescue challenge when a fully loaded truck crashes 40 metres down a mountainside and is completely destroyed. The gruelling conditions and complex logistics make this rescue one of the biggest challenges of their careers. In a nearby ski resort, Svein Arne is on a solo mission to rescue a delivery van that’s taken a very wrong turn.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: Nar ett jordskred forstor en gravmaskin på en avlagsen skogsvag, slår Thord och Bjoern sig samman. Men nar den instabila marken hotar raddningsinsatsen forvandlas uppdraget till en tolv dagar lång utmaning. I Odda, efter annu ett jordskred, fruktar Domenic att falla i vattnet nar han forsoker radda en bil som har spolats ut i fjorden. Tusen kilometer norrut, i Overhalla, hamnar Torstein i dubbelt trubbel nar en lastbil och en bil krockar på samma plats.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Mystiska strukturer på en overgiven italiensk o avslojar ett morkt forflutet. En utforskning av Japans Battleship Island avslojar en orolig historia. Markliga trad på den jemenitiska on Socotra undersoks. På Flores Island i Indonesien hittas en ovanlig skalle i en grotta.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Påskons hoga stenstatyer, moai, har lange fångat varldens fantasi, och det finns fortfarande mysterier kring dem. Av nastan 1 000 statyer, varfor ar en viss moai, kallad Tukuturi, den enda som knabojer och har skagg? I 1950-talets USA var observationer av UFO:n ett nationellt fenomen. Utomjordingar eller inte, många amerikaner insåg inte att den amerikanska militaren arbetade med sina egna flygande tefat: Avrocar. Och strax efter Newtons upptackter om gravitationen foreslog den tyske lakaren Franz Anton Mesmer på 1700-talet också en osynlig kraft som han kallade ”animalisk magnetism”. For att utnyttja den byggde han en anordning av ett gigantiskt tratråg och havdade att den kunde bota alla sjukdomar. Patienterna verkade bekrafta påståendet, men var det sant?

programme.title: Atlas of Cursed Places
programme.desc: Vi kanner alla till myten om den ododlige blodsugande greve Dracula. Många anser att han har en verklig forlaga: den osteuropeiske 1400-talsfursten Vlad Tepes, som hade en forkarlek for att spetsa sina fiender på pålar och vars forbannelse fortfarande hemsoker hans hemland sexhundra år senare. Med hjalp av nya framsteg inom genetiken undersoker Sam Sheridan Vlad Pålspetsarens forbannelse narmare.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: I Port Protection måste invånarna forlita sig på såval hjarna som hjarta om de vill overlista Moder Natur. Oliver och Breanna ger sig ut på sin forsta bjornjakt. Curly hjalper Morgan falla sitt forsta trad. Sam anvander vetenskap for att forbattra planteringsjorden, och Mary hittar på en ny metod att tillaga sin fisk.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Invånarna går samman och kombinerar uråldrig kunskap med ungdomlig styrka for att sakerstalla Port Protections framtid. Sam, Carl och Troy bygger en vital virkesslap. Curly ar sugen på hjarta och lever och genomsoker regnskogen på jakt efter en ung bock. Squibb och Chris uppdaterar sin infrastruktur, och Oliver och Breanna fortsatter stravan att finna bjorn.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer graver ut den outforskade gravkammaren i en gammal pyramid i hopp om att hitta den 4 400 år gamla kungens mumie och hans skatter. Ingen modern arkeolog har till fullo utforskat Sahurepyramiden som har drabbats av en katastrofal kollaps inuti. Dr Mohamed Ismail Khaled och hans team tar sig an den farliga uppgiften att roja undan rasmassorna och gor upptackter for livet.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer jagar ledtrådar som kan kasta ljus over livet och doden i det forna Egyptens forlorade megastad – Alexandria. De upptacker en krock mellan civilisationer nar de graver upp ett enormt hus for de doda. I stadens utkanter bryter de sig in i en intakt grav for att lara sig hur vanliga invånare behandlade sina doda nar Egyptens sista faraoner byggde sin praktfulla huvudstad.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations genomfor flera operationer under tackmantel for narkotikahandel och beslagtar både metamfetamin och fentanyl. Tull- och gransbevakningen samarbetar med jordbruksspecialister i Atlanta for att stoppa farliga livsmedel från att komma in i landet. På JFK har de misstankar om en intern flygbolagskonspiration, och hittar kokain gomt i havregryn från Guatemala.

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Godt vennskap kan redde deg når du står overfor din største frykt. Og Jørgine har en overraskelse på lager - men ingen vil ha den.

programme.title: DNA-jegerane
programme.desc: Anna kom til verda ved hjelp av ein sæddonor. Men informasjonen om han har gått tapt, så Anna ber DNA-jegerane finne han for ho.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Vi snakkes i kveld folkens!

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Har dere hørt om Øystein og Golfen eller?

programme.title: Min ødelagte hjerne
programme.desc: Yago er 47 år når en blodpropp plutselig endrer livet helt. Datteren Eva finner ham tidsnok til å redde livet hans, men Yago har mistet språket.

programme.title: Snøskuter er livet
programme.desc: I USA har Petter Nårsa et helt team med seg når han konkurrerer, til forskjell fra når han er hjemme i Sverige. Men mye kan likevel gå galt.

programme.title: Europa
programme.desc: Norsklæreren Akam lever et komfortabelt liv i Oslo, inntil hans onkel fra Iran kommer på uventet besøk. Til tross for den lille plassen i bokollektivet, føler Akam seg forpliktet til å tilby husrom for et par netter. Den ubeskjedne onkelen tar seg fort til rette, og snart blir det tydelig at han ikke har planer om å reise hjem i nærmeste fremtid. Akam begynner å ane ugler i mosen – er det noe mer bak onkelens spontane besøk? Sannheten kan få uante konsekvenser for dem begge.

programme.title: Kuppforsøket
programme.desc: Etter valget i 2020 nekter Donald Trump å akseptere resultatet. Nå bytter han ut mange rådgivere med fanatikere, og vender blikket mot Arizona.

programme.title: Indias 1st Best Trans Model Agency
programme.desc: Spennende, hjertevarmt og inspirerende om Rudrani Chettri, som drømmer om å hjelpe andre transpersoner fra Delhis gater ut på catwalken.

programme.title: Norges tøffeste
programme.desc: Tette bånd skal bli enda tettere. Og når man er lenket til en vinnerskalle som ikke klarer å styre følelsene sine, kan noen og enhver føle presset.

programme.title: DNA-jegerane
programme.desc: Syrene har fått mange ulike historier om kven faren hennar er. No vil ho vete sanninga. Ho får eit uventa svar og ei gledeleg overrasking.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Har dere hørt om Øystein og Golfen eller?

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Det blir bare jævlig feil for meg å ikke kjøre egen bil.

programme.title: Min ødelagte hjerne
programme.desc: Kaspar og Mai-Britt må flytte. Sanna og Marc vil ut av isolasjonen. Birthe er redd for å bli forlatt. Hvordan elsker man den som ikke er som før?

programme.title: Snøskuter er livet
programme.desc: Et brukket halebein stanser ikke Malene Cottew, verdensmesteren som gir alt. Tross skaden prøver hun å vinne den knallharde Amsoil Cup igjen.

programme.title: Sult 2020
programme.desc: En fattig kunstner går rundt i Oslos gater under koronapandemien vinteren 2021 - like sulten og plaget som Knut Hamsuns romanskikkelse gjorde i 1890.

programme.title: Kuppforsøket
programme.desc: Påstanden om valgjuks vinner ikke frem. Nå satser Trump og hans følgere alt på å presse visepresident Mike Pence til et kuppforsøk.

programme.title: Naboer
programme.desc: John har nettopp blitt dumpet av kjæresten sin, Ingrid. Etter hvert blir han bedre kjent med naboene sine, de vakre søstrene Anne og Kim. Det viser seg at søstrene vet veldig mange personlige detaljer om John, og det blir snart åpenbart at han har blitt fanget i et komplisert, psykologisk spill.

programme.title: Korleis finne gull i Danmark
programme.desc: Gullprisen stig i usikre tider, når vi tyr til det trygge. Men historia til det edle metallet er spennande nok, og sjølv i Danmark kan du finne gull!

programme.title: Med livet i hendene
programme.desc: Traumesenteret på det danske Rigshospitalet er som regel eit lukka land. Men no kan du bli med og sjå dyktige spesialistar i arbeid for å redde liv.

programme.title: Med livet i hendene
programme.desc: Traumesenteret får inn ein mann som har køyrt inn i ein lastebil og eit hus. Nevrokirurgen Rune opplever teknisk svikt under ein hjerneoperasjon.

programme.title: Rådebank
programme.desc: Det blir bare jævlig feil for meg å ikke kjøre egen bil.
